articles.title: Super-engineered vaccines created to help end polio - BBC
articles.description: The first new polio vaccines in 50 years are less likely to mutate into a dangerous form that causes disease.
articles.content:
Scientists have "super-engineered" polio vaccines to prevent them mutating into a dangerous form that can cause outbreaks and paralysis.
